name: Frequently Asked Questions - Peeling and Alquimia

mainEntity.name: What is peeling and what is it for?

acceptedAnswer.text: Peeling is a dermatological procedure that removes the superficial layers of the skin to improve its texture, eliminate imperfections, and stimulate cellular regeneration. It is used to treat fine wrinkles, spots, scars, and acne.

mainEntity.name: What types of peeling are available?

mainEntity.name: How many peeling sessions are needed to see results?

acceptedAnswer.text: The number of sessions depends on the type of peeling and the problem to be treated. Generally, between **3 and 6 sessions** are recommended, with an interval of 15 to 30 days between each one.

mainEntity.name: What is Alquimia and how does it work?

acceptedAnswer.text: Alquimia is an advanced system that combines mechanical and chemical exfoliation technology with personalized active ingredients. It is used to renew the skin, improve its texture, and treat conditions such as spots, wrinkles, and acne scars.

acceptedAnswer.text: An average of **4 to 6 sessions** is recommended, depending on the needs of each patient. Intervals may vary between 15 and 30 days depending on the intensity of the treatment.
